name: Start
text: Hello dear customer! Welcome to the Brazen Bazaar! How may I help you today?

name: positive1
text: The boss is out today! But she's entrusted me with the shop today! WHOOPS!... Ignore that... hehe But I would be glad to assist you, that would be 6 shillings.

name: negative2
text: Well, have I never! If you are so upset feel free to shop elsewhere. You are officially banned from this establishment! Get out of my shop!

name: audacity
text: Excuse me?? Well... I'll tell yo mama!

name: audacity2
text: Yeah! Yo mama! And she's gonna pass away with the shock that her little boy is a wrongful little snot!

name: positive3
text: Well, you seem like an honest personâ€¦ 2 shillings does sound right... DEAL!

name: negative4
text: NO! I have a 5.0 star rating there! Take it! Just take it and go! *Sob* What did I ever do to deserve this??!

name: negative1
text: Well dear me! If you're in a rush you little brat, I can bag this up for you for 8 shillings.

name: negative5
text: Well, the price has just gone up to 8 shillings. If you have an issue with that, you may shop elsewhere.

name: negative8
text: You... You buckethead! Toad kisser! Muffin eating little two timing sheep lover! I'LL KILL YOU!!!

name: negative8
text: COME BACK HERE YOU SMELLY BOOGER EATING BUTTHEAD!!!

name: positive4
text: Well? What is wrong child? Spit it out!

name: positive5
text: I guess I shall allow it for 3 shillings this time. But you better learn some manners next time you come around.

name: PURCHASE JASMINE OIL
text: I've just acquired a JASMINE OIL!
